pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers
Class Database_WriteEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers.Database_WriteEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler
public class Database_WriteEventHandler
extends Object
implements EventHandler

The database write event handler handles all database events that require writing to the database

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

          A private reference to the event dispatcher
